pages.text: Welcome to Assembly Line Machines. $(p)The first thing you will need to do is take your Iron Pickaxe and venture deep within the earth to find Titanium Ore. This block is rare, and found extremely deep in the world, even below Lava pits.

Your first recipe will be the $(item)Fluid Bath.$() With this, you can make many recipes.$(p)The recipes take two items as well as fluid and will return a different item. You also need to mix it with a $(item)Stirring Stick.$()$(p)The Fluid Bath can support Water and Lava, but only Water recipes work with a $(item)Wooden Stirring Stick.

Try combining Sand and Gravel in the Fluid Bath with Water to get $(item)Silt.$() Successful recipes will change color! Then they are ready to be stirred.$(c) Incorrect recipes will turn black. They can be cleared with a SHIFT-RIGHT CLICK.$(thing) You can get Sludge through this!$()$(p)You will need 12 Silt to proceed. Once you are done, you can make Silt Bricks, and the Hand-Operated Grindstone.
You will also need three $(item)Titanium Blade Pieces...
...so you can make a $(item)Titanium Blade!$()$(p)Place down the Grindstone and RIGHT-CLICK with the Titanium Blade to install it!

Now that you have the Grindstone, you can grind down materials. You will need to grind down Iron and Gold (Ore or Ingots) to get $(thing)Ground Ore.$() Combine with Silt and Water in a Fluid Bath, stir, and you will get $(thing)Ore Silt. $()Finally, smelt this Ore Silt to get a $(item)Pure Ingot!$(p)$()You can also smelt Ground Ore outright to perform $(6)Ore Doubling!

pages.title: Ore Silt
pages.text: $(o)$(7)This process can also be performed on Titanium, but it is not required to progress through this Age.

pages.title: Metal Stirring Stick
pages.text: Combine a Titanium Blade Piece with Pure Gold and Lava, stir with a $(thing)Pure Iron Stirring Stick$(), and get a $(item)Pure Gold-Dipped Blade Piece.
This stronger blade can now process Coal to get $(item)Ground Coal$() on the Grindstone!$(p)$(7)$(o)You can SHIFT-RIGHT CLICK the Grindstone to remove the blade installed.

pages.title: Steel
pages.text: Combine Ground Coal or Ground Charcoal and Ground Iron in a Fluid Bath with Lava, stir, and you will receive a $(item)Steel Ingot!$()$(p)This marks the end of the Primitive Age. Carry on to the $(l:age2)Crank Age$() to continue!
